Text.Language: Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ piar,/aggeloc e#y#u#: Mi,a/l p~ar,wn n~na niv/oui: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf: O holy archangel: Michael the head of the heavenly: that He may forgive us our sins.
